title: My Path to Akamai
description: Three years ago, I graduated with a bachelor's degree in Electronic Engineering (Mechatronic) from University Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia. I was to be an engineer in the oil and gas industry - but the universe had a better plan for me. Instead, I stepped into IT, providing Technical Support despite my lack of knowledge. I was struggling! But it was there that I found my passion.
author: Amirah Zahidah binti Onn
